Residential Painting and Decorating Service in London

[/vc_column_text]

[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1628689155952{background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1548506821695{padding-top: 60px !important;padding-bottom: 60px !important;}”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1552419604532{margin-top: 40px !important;}”][vc_column_text font_family=”Playfair Display” color=”#404040″]

The most extensive range of residential painting and decorating services in London

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”20px”]

Whether a box room or grand hall, trust us to love your home and with our exceptional service!

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/4″][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][vc_single_image image=”8997″ img_size=”500×500″ alignment=”center” onclick=”custom_link” link=”https://thegoodpainter.co.uk/houses-painting-and-decorating/”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner]

Houses

[vc_column_text]

Transforming London homes of all styles, sizes, and ages with our trusted residential painting and decorating services. We will deliver your dream home and space on time.

[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner offset=”vc_hidden-lg vc_hidden-md”][vc_empty_space]
Learn More
[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/4″][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][vc_single_image image=”9001″ img_size=”500×500″ alignment=”center” onclick=”custom_link” link=”https://thegoodpainter.co.uk/apartments-painting-and-decorating/”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner]

Apartments

[vc_column_text]

Transforming tower blocks into sophisticated city apartments is our speciality. Our friendly team will decorate your home without disturbing your neighbours.

[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner offset=”vc_hidden-lg vc_hidden-md”][vc_empty_space]
Learn More
[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/4″][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][vc_single_image image=”8999″ img_size=”500×500″ alignment=”center” onclick=”custom_link” link=”https://thegoodpainter.co.uk/heritage-painting-and-decorating/”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner]

Heritage Properties

[vc_column_text]

Buildings protected by English Heritage are safe in our hands. We’re the experts in renovating and overhauling without damaging the buildings’ fabrics.

[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner offset=”vc_hidden-lg vc_hidden-md”][vc_empty_space]
Learn More
[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/4″][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][vc_single_image image=”9000″ img_size=”500×500″ alignment=”center” onclick=”custom_link” link=”https://thegoodpainter.co.uk/wallpaper-hanging-services/”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner]

Wallpapering

[vc_column_text]

No wallpapering job is too tricky or complicated for The Good Painter. We bring a showroom finish even to the most intricate designs, creating unique spaces.

[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner offset=”vc_hidden-lg vc_hidden-md”][vc_empty_space]

You could be living in your dream home right now

[/vc_column_text]
GET AN ONLINE QUOTE NOW
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row content_placement=”top” css=”.vc_custom_1626872068498{margin-top: 40px !important;margin-left: 5px !important;padding-top: 10px !important;}”][vc_column][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][vc_column_text color=”#404040″ css=”.vc_custom_1626870874722{padding-top: 20px !important;padding-bottom: 20px !important;}” font_size=”d:30|tp:25|pl:25|pp:25″ font_family=”Playfair Display”]

Painting and decorating Residential projects we have delivered in London

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner]

Before and After: A chic and stylish painting and decorating makeover for a busy London businesswoman

When Ana first came to us, she had just become the owner of a two-bedroom…

Success story: Painting and decorating a four-storey family house in Chelsea, London

Yasmina and Labib moved into a five-bedroom house in Chelsea, London a number of years…

Before and After: First Home, First Painting and Decorating Experience for Young Couple

Buying a first property is always exciting but can be challenging - especially for a…

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1553017658630{padding-top: 40px !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;}”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1552419501389{margin-top: 40px !important;}”][vc_column_text font_family=”Playfair Display” color=”#404040″ font_size=”d:30|pp:25″]

Our painting and decorating process explained

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”20px”][vc_column_text responsive_text=”true” font_family=”Playfair Display” color=”#404040″ font_size=”d:18|pp:15″ text_align=”center”]

Our five-step process for guaranteed satisfaction!

[/vc_column_text][vc_tta_tabs style=”flat” color=”white” spacing=”20″ gap=”15″ alignment=”center” active_section=”1″ no_fill_content_area=”true” css=”.vc_custom_1553017690228{padding-top: 40px !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;}”][vc_tta_section title=”Initial consultation and survey” tab_id=”1551698827437-3c7c625a-ea30″][vc_row_inner content_placement=”top” css=”.vc_custom_1567526564254{margin-left: -30px !important;}”][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1567526591897{margin-left: 20px !important;}”]

Share your dreams. We will make them come true.

[vc_column_text text_align=”left” css=”.vc_custom_1626852762944{padding-bottom: 20px !important;}”]Prior painting and decorating job, our initial consultation is our opportunity to listen. Here, we start a professional, trusting relationship and establish a thorough understanding of your decor desires. During the meeting we will:[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text color=”#404040″]
  • Answer any questions related to your painting project
  • Explain all about paint colours, paint types, and paint finishes
  • Advice on how to transform your home by using colour
  • Walk you through the process
  • Get feedback on your design ideas
  • Work out timings and budget
  • Plus answer any other burning questions you might have
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”9025″ css=”.vc_custom_1626876943870{padding-top: 15px !important;}”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”Planning and organising” tab_id=”1551698827548-e1ed5acb-665e”][vc_row_inner content_placement=”top” css=”.vc_custom_1545307900212{margin-left: -30px !important;padding-top: 30px !important;}”][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1551702562457{margin-left: 20px !important;}”]

Planning to succeed

[vc_column_text color=”#404040″]The next stage is where we excel the most. We love to plan because we know how valuable your time is. We want to avoid disruption to your routine during painting and decorating project as much as possible. We put together thorough plans. We meticulously detail the painting and decorating process so that nothing gets lost in translation. We establish a timeline and put together the ideal project team of expert painters and decorators to carry out your project with clarity and efficiency. It’s why we’re London’s favourite painting and decorating service.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”9031″][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”Preparation and painting” tab_id=”1551700279412-1c75ce42-4ae9″][vc_row_inner content_placement=”top” css=”.vc_custom_1545307900212{margin-left: -30px !important;padding-top: 30px !important;}”][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1551702573074{margin-left: 20px !important;}”]

Every painting and decorating job is perfectly planned and organised.

[vc_column_text color=”#404040″]Your home is completely safe in our hands. We treat every client’s home as if it were our own. We protect all surfaces and furniture, and prepare the space for painting or wallpapering. Painting and decorating services are our speciality and quality is our obsession. We will transform your space using the highest quality products and loving attention to detail. We can even pick up your keys from a neighbour or nearby location if you’re not going to be around.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”9027″][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”Cleaning” tab_id=”1551700488341-e950ee0b-e716″][vc_row_inner content_placement=”top” css=”.vc_custom_1545307900212{margin-left: -30px !important;padding-top: 30px !important;}”][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1551702582683{margin-left: 20px !important;}”]

You will only know we have been there from the stunning painting and decorating work we leave behind.

[vc_column_text color=”#404040″]You will only know we have been there from the stunning work we leave behind. The dust never settles. Once the paint has dried, and the wallpaper is professionally finished, your dedicated project manager quality checks the entire space. We pride ourselves on the care and attention we inject into every project. It’s why London loves our decorating and painting services. We will thoroughly clean and remove all waste materials. We take extra care to return everything just as we found it. You’ll never know we’ve been there.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”9032″][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”Handover” tab_id=”1551700784130-57d99f5d-067d”][vc_row_inner content_placement=”top” css=”.vc_custom_1545307900212{margin-left: -30px !important;padding-top: 30px !important;}”][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1551702594525{margin-left: 20px !important;}”]

If you are not 100% happy, neither are we

[vc_column_text color=”#404040″]Our work isn’t over until you’re delighted. We follow up every project with a thorough review. We’ll ensure that you know how to care for your freshly decorated home. Our review will help you maintain the pristine appearance of your beautiful new space. And before we go, we provide a “Finishes Schedule”. So when your Auntie Mary admires your fabulously fresh colour scheme, you will be able to tell her that the colour of your walls was Spiced Honey from Dulux.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”9029″][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_tta_section][/vc_tta_tabs][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1626870563389{margin-top: 20px !important;padding-top: 40px !important;background-color: #442e3a !important;}”][vc_column]

What our customers think

Great team and excellent job! The Good Painter was recommended by a friend of mine, also a professional landlord. The team didn’t disappoint, great service and excellent quality job! I will use the Good Painter the next time I need painting and decorating in London!

AlexSee Case Study
Rating: 5

My wife and I are more than pleased with the final result, and can’t wait to invite friends and family over to our new looking home. We are quite certain to have dealings with your firm in future projects. I would 100% recommend you to my friends, family and colleagues.

JonathanSee Case Study
Rating: 5

Thank you The Good painter! We are extremely happy with the results! We couldn’t ask for a friendlier, more hardworking and dedicated team of professionals! Would happily recommend The Good Painter to friends and family!

 

YasminaSee Case Study
Rating: 5

Thank you! We love our new flat, it looks absolutely stunning! We are so happy to have chosen The Good Painter, a fantastic team of hard working guys! Very professional, flexible and friendly service throughout. The good Painter are indeed good painters, excellent painters!

PavelSee case study
Rating: 5

Punctual, friendly and very professional! I have used the services of The Good Painter before and would gladly use them again! The job was completed on time and at a very high quality, the price was excellent, the customer service-very competent and friendly. A pleasure to work with!

AnaSee Case Study
Rating: 5

Thank you, The Good Painter! We really appreciate you finishing the job despite the tight time frame and budget!  A team of professionals, decoration at the highest level! We couldn’t be happier with the results.

MonicaSee Case Study
Rating: 5

I recently became a house owner for the first time and needed quality painting and decorating services at a good price. The Good Painter provided both, plus excellent decoration and colour consultancy advice on the top. Stress-free service, very helpful and friendly customer service! I definitely recommend! Thank you!

ZoeSee Case Study
Rating: 5

Easy to work with, friendly, professional and really efficient. What more could you ask for! My flat has never looked better! The decorators did an excellent job!

Bill
Rating: 5
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” content_placement=”top” css=”.vc_custom_1552936702439{margin-left: -30px !important;padding-top: 30px !important;background-color: #efebe7 !important;}”][vc_column offset=”vc_hidden-sm vc_hidden-xs”][vc_empty_space height=”40″][vc_column_text text_align=”center” font_family=”Playfair Display” color=”#404040″]

We use superior products

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”20″]

We guarantee a perfect result.

[vc_row_inner content_placement=”middle” css=”.vc_custom_1569584925162{margin-left: -30px !important;padding-top: 30px !important;}”][vc_column_inner width=”1/5″][vc_single_image image=”1065″ alignment=”center”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/5″][vc_single_image image=”1081″ alignment=”center”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/5″][vc_single_image image=”1067″ alignment=”center”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/5″][vc_single_image image=”1018″ alignment=”center”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/5″][vc_single_image image=”1083″ alignment=”center”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” content_placement=”top” css=”.vc_custom_1552936702439{margin-left: -30px !important;padding-top: 30px !important;background-color: #efebe7 !important;}”][vc_column offset=”vc_hidden-lg vc_hidden-md”][vc_column_text text_align=”center” font_family=”Playfair Display” color=”#404040″]

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”20px”]
